alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 12:24AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Aitkin and southern Crow Wing Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1224 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Saint Mathias, to near Vineland, to 7 miles southwest of Onamia, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Garrison around 1235 AM CDT. Brainerd and Upper South Long Lake around 1240 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Mille Lacs Lake, Malmo, Crosby, Ironton, Deerwood, Cuyuna and McGrath. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central and east central Minnesota.
